meanings.definition: A periodical publication containing news and articles of current interest.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading newsmagazines to stay updated on current events.
meanings.sent2: My mom subscribes to several newsmagazines to read during her free time.
meanings.sent3: The newsmagazines were so interesting that I couldn't put them down.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library filled with newsmagazines of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The newsmagazines painted a vivid picture of the world's happenings.

meanings.definition: The act of producing or working for a newsmagazine.
meanings.sent1: She found her passion in newsmagazines and decided to pursue a career in journalism.
meanings.sent2: Working for newsmagazines requires dedication and a keen eye for detail.
meanings.sent3: The newsmagazines industry can be fast-paced and exciting.
meanings.sent4: In her job, she was the heartbeat of the newsmagazines, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: His love for newsmagazines shone through in every article he wrote.
